trans-unit.source: Represents a context that is set up during workflow activation using the workflow hosting endpoint to handle arguments, and receive workflow completion notifications.
Initiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a value that indicates if the workflow instance should be suspended or run after creation..
`true` if the workflow instance is suspended after it is created ; `false` if the workflow is run after it is created.

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext.OnBeginWorkflowCompleted(System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.Exception,System.TimeSpan,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)"></xref> method is called in a transaction..
`true` if a completion transaction is required; otherwise, `false`.
Aborts the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext"></xref>.
Begins an asynchronous operation to perform workflow instance completion notification.
This method is called when the workflow instance associated with this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext"></xref> completes.
Derived classes can override this operation to perform custom actions on workflow instance completion.
The state of the workflow instance.
A collection of key/value pairs that contain output generated by the workflow instance.
If present, an error that caused the workflow to terminate.
The time interval during which the asynchronous operation must complete.
The location in an application to which control returns when the asynchronous operation completes.
User-defined state.
The status of the asynchronous operation.
Completes an asynchronous operation that notifies workflow instance completion associated with this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowCreationContext"></xref>.
The status of the asynchronous operation.
Gets the arguments passed to the newly created workflow instance.
A dictionary of key/value pair arguments to the workflow instance.
